title_en: Daily COVID-19 Vaccine Registrations by State, Gender & Age
title_ms: Pendaftaran Vaksin COVID-19 Harian mengikut Negeri, Jantina & Umur
description_en: Daily registrations for the COVID-19 vaccine via MySejahtera, at the national and state level, broken down by age group and gender. The table below provides a truncated preview of the full dataset.
description_ms: Pendaftaran harian melalui MySejahtera bagi vaksin COVID-19 di peringkat kebangsaan dan negeri, dengan pecahan mengikut kumpulan umur dan jantina. Jadual di bawah memberi gambaran ringkas kepada set data penuh.
methodology_en: This data was tabulated from 1 year's worth (23 Feb 2021-22 Feb 2022) of anonymised individual-level registrations for the COVID-19 vaccine via MySejahtera application. A small minority of records (< 0.01%) with null ages and sex were dropped from the dataset.
methodology_ms: Data pendaftaran vaksin COVID-19 ini diperolehi daripada aplikasi MySejahtera bermula dari 23 Feb 2021 sehingga 22 Feb 2022 (tempoh setahun) tanpa sebarang maklumat peribadi. Sebahagian  kecil rekod (< 0.01%) tanpa rekod umur dan jantina telah digugurkan daripada set data.
caveat_en: This data does not include individuals who registered via the website (vaksincovid.gov.my, now deprecated) or call centre. Although those registrations were used operationally during the program, they were intentionally excluded from this dataset due to the extremely high duplication of registrations via MySejahtera versus those two modalities. Furthermore, it should be noted that the individual's state was self-declared and unverified, and may therefore be different from the individual's state of residence, or even the state where they eventually received their vaccine. Therefore, appropriate caution should be applied when comparing registration data to actual vaccination throughput or population data.
caveat_ms: Data ini hanya mengambil kira data pendaftaran vaksinasi individu melalui aplikasi MySejahtera dan tidak termasuk individu yang mendaftar melalui laman web vaksincovid.gov.my (kini sudah ditutup) atau pusat panggilan bagi mengelakkan pertindihan maklumat. Perlu diingat bahawa maklumat negeri bagi setiap individu didalam data ini adalah maklumat yang didaftarkan sendiri oleh individu tersebut di dalam aplikasi MySejahtera. Oleh itu, anda dinasihati untuk berhati-hati sekiranya membandingkan data pendaftaran dengan data vaksinasi sebenar ataupun data populasi.

fields.name: age
fields.description_en: [Categorical] Five-year age groups (e.g. 25-29, 30-34, 35-39), with special categories for children (0-11), adolescents (12-17) and young adults (18-24). 85+ is the oldest category.
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Kumpulan umur dengan julat 5 tahun (contohnya 25-29, 30-34, 35-39), dengan kategori khas untuk kanak-kanak (0-11), remaja (12-17) dan dewasa muda (18-24). 85+ adalah kumpulan yang tertua.

fields.name: registrations
fields.description_en: [Integer] Number of individuals who registered via MySejahtera
fields.description_ms: [Integer] Bilangan individu yang mendaftar melalui MySejahtera
